website_summaries.verdict: The Amped Wireless High Power Wireless-N 600mW Gigabit Router R10000G would be a good choice for those who need exceptional Wi-Fi coverage.
pros: The Amped Wireless High Power Wireless-N 600mW Gigabit Router R10000G offers exceptional range and decent data rates
cons: The Amped Wireless R10000G doesn't offer dual-band, runs hot, and is a little hard to get a connection to at long range
The router's plastic housing feels flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Careful - seems suitable only for simple, plain-vanilla configuration.
customer_reviews.text: If you need a router for a simple network implementation, maybe this is okay. But, if you want it to use it as a subnet in a larger network, be careful. Some configuration parameters are unconventionally presented and not documented, and I was unable to change the local IP address parameters. Multiple factory resets and attempts at different approaches, but no success. So, it's a nice package and I'm sure perfect for a simple network, but it goes back.
customer_reviews.author: Techy Guy

customer_reviews.title: Bad Power - Features Stink - xBox live wont work
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the power that this actually gives out. I bought it with an additional antenna and it cant reach my top floor. Its not like I live in a mansion. Also basic router functions like block individual IPs from accessing the internet are not available. Scheduling is difficult at best. Support seems to be descent the 2 times I had to call, but I shouldn't have had to. Also we cannot keep xBox Live connected.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Tenney

customer_reviews.title: Complete junk!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Complete junk!!!! The antenna was detached from the back of the unit and with the unit hooked up a 100 feet away from the router the single stunk!! This product cannot achieve the distance as stated on their web page!! Please don't waste your time unless you buy it thru Amazon with their flawless return department, because if you know what other units comparable to this on can achieve for a cheaper price to you will be returning it!!
customer_reviews.author: joemas777

customer_reviews.title: a bit of a rip off
customer_reviews.text: This wireless access point is advertised as being super powerful - enough for a whole office complex or a 10 000sqft house. In fact it wasn't at all stronger then my ancient Cisco router. Absolute no difference in signal strength. Same weak signal in the far rooms of my 2500sqft house ( regular framed walls, nothing unusual ). The download speed was a bit faster, but that's it. Hardly worth the extra $60
customer_reviews.author: amaleshk

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.text: It's not as good as I thought it would be, from time to time my game lag a lot and I have the second best internet in timewarner cable which it give the conclusion that the Problem is this guy, I mean it's great if you only have one or two devices running at the same time once you activate more them that it's start to lag.
customer_reviews.author: jorge

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wireless router!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome wireless router, that eliminated all dead spaces in my 3,200 foot single floor home, giving excellent reception everywhere, even on patio. Easy to install without installation disc, but a little tricky in upgrading to most recent firmware, following online directions. When downloading upgraded firmware file, comes in unzipped single file, which you have to separate instructions from software file after download, then use only software file for correct installation. Received resolution of this problem by calling Amped Wireless Elite Support with assistance from Steve (speaking fluent English!!), who guided me through successfully. However, after upgrade all old settings are lost, requiring reinstallation, which even Steve didn't know. Love the power down timer. Paul Lorenz, Fort Myers, FL
customer_reviews.author: Paul P. Lorenz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Quality and Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because our old NetGear router just didn't have enough power to wifi thru-out the house. Had a small issue and contacted Amped Customer service, they were awesome. Recommended a better location for the router and walked me thru the process. Not cheap, but you get what you pay for, and their customer services ranks 5 Stars! Highly recommend Amped products!
customer_reviews.author: ChipBaskets

customer_reviews.title: Great Range
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this router so far. I purchased it as a replacement router for a different brand that kept flaming out on me. So I was a little concerned about this router as I was not familiar with the brand. However it has worked great and has wonderful range! It's quick and very satisfactory. The only thing I wish is that it had a USB port that I could use to plug in an external network drive.
customer_reviews.author: The Catservant

customer_reviews.title: ... business of networking customer's all the time they work great for connecting smaller ranges of around 200ft to 300 ...
customer_reviews.text: These are power house repeater's I use them for my business of networking customer's all the time they work great for connecting smaller ranges of around 200ft to 300 ft maybe 400ft if los is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a router with POWER
customer_reviews.text: WAY better than the typical 30 mW output found on most routers. At 600 mW, that's 12 dB hotter than standard units, providing way better service over longer ranges. We coupled one of these routers to a 25 dB gain 2.5 gig Yagi antenna and get coverage over a range of 10 miles (16 kM)
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Not so great.
customer_reviews.text: Claims to be high power, but it did not deliver on it's promises. Also dropped connections to my teenagers PS3. Not acceptable, just ask him. I bought the Linksys WRT 1900AC "Bad Boy" with 4 antennas from Amazon. It is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Danny D

customer_reviews.title: Even after explaining to Amped tech support they recommended that I use my linksys with a range extender
customer_reviews.text: Device does not even have as much range as my old linksys. The "high power" statement is a hoax. Even after explaining to Amped tech support they recommended that I use my linksys with a range extender! As least they were honest about that!
customer_reviews.author: Bomba

customer_reviews.title: it is fast but has to be reset about once a week
customer_reviews.text: I like this item but I ended up putting it on a timer so it shuts itself off every morning around 3 am for a few minutes to reset.....otherwise I have to go and unplug it and then plug it in again about once a week to keep the wireless working
customer_reviews.author: WLH B&B

customer_reviews.title: Great Support!!
customer_reviews.text: Telephone support is the pits!! Especially when everyone in the house is complaining because they lost their wi fi --- no Internet and no netflix. After 45 minutes on hold with my Internet provider then no help and a promise to call back later, I called Amped support and spoke with David. He was courteous, knowledgeable and very patient. Even though the problem may have been from the provider, he came up with a fix. Great support is a reason to buy from Amped.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Rassas

customer_reviews.title: This router didn't work for me, I had problems ...
customer_reviews.text: This router didn't work for me, I had problems getting it to connect to wireless clients. I returned it for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: NaplesHow

customer_reviews.title: The best one
customer_reviews.text: I start to use this one, easy to set up, Signal strong arouse the 2000 sf 2 story house even around the yard , the best one I had compare which those I had before Linksys E2500 which give me a lot of trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Quan Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: A cheap WAP with signal boosters.
customer_reviews.text: Good signal strength, but it's a cheap WAP/router and locks up on a regular basis like any other cheap WAP. Mine eventually failed. I'm returning it to Amazon. I wouldn't buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_user_666

customer_reviews.title: Great Router! Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: With an upgraded cable service, we needed a new router and this one came highly recommended. The price was very good, too. Totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: jdhd

customer_reviews.title: The way support is suppose to be!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Amped router mod# R10000G, next day delivery. Setup was very straight forward and fast. I had a questions about settings so I called their tech support #, the young lady I spoke with was very knowledgeable and stayed on the line with me while she emailed me undated firmware. AAA+++ Highly recommened!
customer_reviews.author: Doug Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Was not able to get a decent connection in the driveway but it works great now. Only had it two weeks but so ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Was not able to get a decent connection in the driveway but it works great now. Only had it two weeks but so far so good. Not hard to setup at all.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the hype. Actually less powerful than my ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't believe the hype. Actually less powerful than my old Linksys WRT54G. IP Cameras that worked with the old Linksys are now out of range for the amped wireless router. I was expecting a significant signal boost with this unit, only to now face the hassle of having to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Linn

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Live Up to Expectation
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I bought this was to solve the wireless range problem in my house. The advertising and some of the reviews claimed excellent range with this router. When I got it home and connected it per product instructions, the range problem remained. I returned the router.
customer_reviews.author: Daymond Nichols

customer_reviews.title: A little less than advertised but still a great tool!
customer_reviews.text: The range is less than expected and advertised. But the software for administrating the router as well as the over-all functionality is great!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Schumann

customer_reviews.title: Bad garanty policy from Amped !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this router in Dec 2014. Yesterday, Oct 18 2015, all lights are on. I contact Amped (chat). They say the the device has bricked ! I am living is Guatemala and they ask me to pay for the shipment 2 ways, that will cost more tha the router itself !
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Florentis

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this item because what I need it was the extender so they replaced it and that works fine
customer_reviews.author: Joe Lopez

customer_reviews.title: R10000G
customer_reviews.text: I needed a wireless router for a large home in northern Michigan where our Internet connection is delivered by satellite. The R10000G provides excellent wireless connectivity. The problems I had getting it set up were handled competently and professionally by tech support. Brian #110 was terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what I needed for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I have a 10Ksf building and needed wifi on both ends of it. I was told I'd have to really invest heavily, but this product gives me great coverage beyond where I really expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I can't connect wirelessly if I am 20 feet from the router
customer_reviews.author: ACharacter

customer_reviews.title: Very Bad!
customer_reviews.text: very buggy. Once you change any setting in the router, it disappears from the contact. Only after Unplug the power cord after work.
customer_reviews.author: oleg

customer_reviews.title: Amped Router R1000G
customer_reviews.text: Finally a dependable router. Have a boxload of other brand routers which had a variety of issues. This Amped Router provides the comfortable feeling that my WIFI signal will be there when I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Nat Medina

customer_reviews.title: like the old wireless I had
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to amped,, but I can say I have not had to restart my amped modem, like the old wireless I had.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cole

customer_reviews.title: The worse router EVER
customer_reviews.text: The worse router EVER !!! spend 2 hours trying to make it work - no luck (I'm IT professional with over 15 years of experience)
customer_reviews.author: Ross Lavnikevich

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding customer support, excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have now used three of these, and am very happy with them. When I had difficulty re-configuring one, Patrick - Concierge #131 at their customer support was great. He emailed me a firmware update, and walked me through the installation and configuration process. Outstanding customer support, excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent products, excellent customer service, especially by Andrew. major improvement in signal strength and ability to stream.
customer_reviews.author: kayak

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: It works great. Installation was easy and it works as advertized.
customer_reviews.author: MikeB

customer_reviews.title: not sure
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure that this wireless holds up to its hype. I installed it and did not see very significant anything...nothing what I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: knowie

customer_reviews.title: Amped wireless router
customer_reviews.text: This wireless router is much stronger than the Cisco one I had , it works great the router is up stairs so it would not reach our kitchen or the sitting room , now it's works everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Jrp2250

customer_reviews.title: Over Hyped!
customer_reviews.text: Way over hyped. Setup was overly involved and range of signal was disappointing. Returned it and purchased a Netgear dual band Router that out performs the Amped Wireless.
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Product works great so far! Instructions were extremely straightforward and tech support (Chelsa - Concierge #120) was very helpful and friendly :) Wireless range to the far side of the house with the new R10000G router and SB1000 booster antenna has increased substantially.
customer_reviews.author: One Love One Heart One World

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money- being returned!
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended! Keeps dropping signal. Very frustrating when trying to use Amazon Fire stick with multiple pauses :(
customer_reviews.author: KRISTINA Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Malfunction after 8 hours
customer_reviews.text: Set up easily. Good instructions. Had a broadcast range that was much improved over the Comcast rental gateway. However, 8 hours after set up the throughput was erratic and sloooooow. Still had 5 bars but sloooow data transfers. Checked the cable modem and desktop speedtest.net which was great. But all wireless devices experienced erratic throughput. Changed the channel a couple times, rebooted a couple times, turned off WPA - made no difference. Called tech support and their comment was, "well, it should work." They had no suggestions for trouble shooting. They told me to return it. I did and bought an ASUS RT-N66U.Much happier.
customer_reviews.author: Birdseed

customer_reviews.title: NO TAN BUENO
customer_reviews.text: Is a good article BUT TO CHECK MORE QUALITY CONTROL AND CAME TO ME WITH POWER CORD INJURED THANKS TO AMAZON COULD SOLVE THE POWER CORD
customer_reviews.author: jose navas

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work as described
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this router and a repeater to cover the area in my house(8000 sq ft). It doesn't cover 1/4 of it. I replaced it with the Pro series, and it isn't much better. I won't make this mistake again.
customer_reviews.author: bamaboy

customer_reviews.title: Didn't extend wifi range at all
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because my router/modem is too far away from my xbox 360 for me to connect to xbox live. On the package it said 10,000 square feet of coverage, our house is less than 2,000 square feet. I installed it and wouldn't you know, the coverage was worse than before. I returned the product and will continue shopping. Extremely disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: brian gyfteas

customer_reviews.title: Range not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but did not increase signal strength or range over my previous router.
customer_reviews.author: Seth B. Burgess

customer_reviews.title: SUPERB
customer_reviews.text: HAD TO CALLS WITHIN THE WEEK-ONE WITH A ROUTER AND THE OTHER OUR EXTENDER. THE CODES HAD CHANGED AND CREATED QUITE AN ACCESS PROBLEM. . BOTH TECHS WERE VERY PATIENT AND THOROUGH.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia S. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup. Installed the latest firmware right away. Signal strength is no better than my ancient Linksys. Continually drops internet connection and needs to be rebooted. I am unwilling to call customer support and waste the time messing around with it. I'll just buy a router that works right away thank you. Don't bother with this product you will probably do much better by buying one of the routers recommended in the other reviews. I am returning this product ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: C. Evans

customer_reviews.title: It works but doesn't quite have the extended range I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't quite have the range I was looking for. Plugged it in and came up fine, no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: William Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Don't Go Here
customer_reviews.text: Was excited about all the features of this router; however, it just does not deliver. It continually is dropping the signal. It is actually slower than using my cell as a hotspot but the main reason I suggest you look at another company is their absolute complete lack of product support. I am still waiting for their technical people to contact me. Their support people work bankers hours so if you work for a living there is no way your schedule and the support departments schedule will synch up. I have already made arrangements to return it. My suggestion, go with a more established company.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth D. Laxer

customer_reviews.title: HUNK OF JUNK ! !
customer_reviews.text: I wasted a week waiting on this router. It is NOT compatible with my home equipmetn. When I recieved this router and called Amped Weireless customer service they were so rude and did not care to help me. One agent started to shout over the phone. I then hung up disconnected the router from my PC reconnected and boxed it up and sent it back to Amazon. This Unit is a HUNK OF JUNK ! DO NOT BUY THIS YOU WILL BE SORRY YOU DID ! How ever Amazon agents were kind enough to take it back with no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: Danny O'Dell

customer_reviews.title: This the router I was looing for
customer_reviews.text: This the router i have looking for replace my old dlink router I would recommend this router to my friends. simple to use
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: R10000G Router rocks!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this router for my new Home because I cant have a wired network but need a great connection for my work. Its everything I was hoping for. My connections speeds through this router are just a good as if it were wired and it works well in every room of this 4 store home. The tech support I received from Chelsa - Concierge #120 at Amped Wireless was outstanding. Thanks again
customer_reviews.author: Moonshadow

customer_reviews.title: Don't be scared by price. Worth every PENNY!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the top rated router on Amazon, the Medialink - Wireless N Router about 3 months ago. I figured for 50 bucks couldnt go wrong. It was ok but lots of dead spots in my 2000 square foot home, which is not a mansion by any means. Router would show full bars but only get about a 10th of the speed of my ISP. I then saw a review of this Amped router in CNET. I was scared to purchase at first but I am so glad I did. I get 100% speed now in every square inch of my home. Don't hesitate to buy this router!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Wireless issue Solved!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amped Wireless was a perfect solution to our house wireless network! It is very powerful and really works! I reccommend!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Cordeiro

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my application
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several Amped products and I have not had any luck. Pros: Great return policy Cons: Cheap plastic feel gets hot Did not give me the extra distance that I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mursuli

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: this is an amazing router! works for TWO houses, the only issue is if there are more than 3 items on the router at a time, it slows down, but that usual.
customer_reviews.author: meghan

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T WORK PROPERLY
customer_reviews.text: THE ROUTER IS FAR FROM WHAT I EXPECTED. THE CUSTOMER SERVICE WAS NOT VERY WELL TRAINED TO ATTEMPT TO RESOLVE CUSTOMER PROBLEMS DURING INSTALLATION. THE INSTALLATION DISK DID NOT RUN MAKING IT ALL THE HARDER TO EVEN ATTEMPT TO GET IT CONNECTED PROPERLY. I FINALLY GOT TO THE POINT THAT I RETURNED IT FOR CREDIT.
customer_reviews.author: FRED

customer_reviews.title: Cant even cover 3,200 sq ft
customer_reviews.text: I bought this router because my current netgear router couldn't cover my 3,200 sq ft home. This one claims 10,000 sq ft but coverage is worse than my old one.
customer_reviews.author: LordVG

product_meta.title: Amped Wireless High Power Wireless-N 600mW Gigabit Router (R10000G)
product_meta.description:
The Amped Wireless High Power Wireless-N 600mW Gigabit Router provides long range, high performance wireless Internet access over extreme distances. The R10000G is equipped with advanced dual 600mW wireless amplifiers and 5dBi detachable high gain antennas to provide up to 10,000 square feet of high performance Wi-Fi coverage. The High Power Gigabit Router features a powerful 620MHz internal processor, five gigabit networking ports for blazing fast wired connections and MIMO Wi-Fi technology for ultra-fast wireless speeds. The High Power Gigabit Router is great for providing extreme range Wi-Fi coverage and ultra-fast wired connections for large homes (and backyards), and multi-floor offices or warehouses.

AMAZON.COM




FROM THE MANUFACTURER


How the High Power Wireless-N 600mW Gigabit Router Works. View larger
The Smart Setup Wizard automatically configures your Internet connection and wireless network
Connectors and Ports for the R10000G.
View larger The Amped Wireless High Power Wireless-N 600mW Gigabit Router provides long range, high performance wireless Internet access over extreme distances. The R10000G is equipped with advanced dual 600mW wireless amplifiers and 5dBi detachable high gain antennas to provide up to 10,000 sq ft of high performance Wi-Fi coverage. The High Power Gigabit Router features a powerful 620MHz internal processor, five gigabit networking ports for blazing fast wired connections and MIMO Wi-Fi technology for ultra-fast wireless speeds. The High Power Gigabit Router is great for providing extreme range Wi-Fi coverage and ultra-fast wired connections for large homes (and backyards), and multi-floor offices or warehouses.

EXTREME RANGE WI-FI COVERAGE
Add long range wireless Internet access to your home or office. Dual 600mW high power amplifiers and dual 5dBi high gain antennas provide the power to add up to 10,000 sq. ft. of amplified wireless coverage.

PENETRATE WALLS AND ELIMINATE DEAD SPOTS
High-power amplifiers and high-power antennas provide powerful Wi-Fi coverage that easily penetrates walls and Wi-Fi obstructions to provide Wi-Fi coverage in hard to reach areas.

High Power 600mW Wireless Amplifiers and 5dBi High Gain Antennas provide up to 10,000 sqft* of coverage. View larger
Range comparison to standard Wi-Fi routers.
View larger GIGABIT NETWORKING
The High Power Gigabit Router provides up to four 10/100/1000M network ports for connecting additional wired computers, AV devices and other network devices at ultra-fast wired speeds.

POWERFUL PROCESSOR
The High Power Gigabit Router features a powerful 620MHz internal processor for computing networking commands at blazing speeds which results in faster wired and wireless speeds.

SMART SECURITY FEATURES
You're in control. Smart security features allow you to restrict access to specific users, set a daily time schedule for when the wireless network is available and when it is not and control how far your wireless network coverage reaches through wireless output power adjustments. The High Power Router also supports secure push button setup for WPS enabled devices.

WEBSITE BLOCKING AND FIREWALL PROTECTION
Block access to specific websites and protect your network from outside intruders with an advanced SPI firewall.

GUEST NETWORKS
Create additional wireless networks for guests or conference rooms with access to the Internet only. Protect your local computers and servers from access by guest users.

SMART, SIMPLE SETUP
The Smart Setup Wizard walks you through the simple setup process and automatically configures the settings of your Internet provider.

GREAT FOR LARGE HOMES AND OFFICES
The high power Wi-Fi capabilities of the High Power Router is great for providing powerful wireless coverage for larger homes, backyards, offices and warehouses.

Industry leading technical support and customer service
Free Wi-Fi Analytics Tool Android App to help optimize and analyze Wi-Fi networks
Satisfaction guaranteed with the Amped Wireless Range Increase Guarantee WHAT'S IN THE BOX?
Amped Wireless High Power Wireless-N 600mW Gigabit Router, 2 detachable 5dBi high gain antennas, 2 RJ-45 Ethernet cables, Setup Guide, CD with User's Manual and installation video, stand for vertical mounting, warranty.

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS
 * Model: R10000G
 * Technology: Wireless-N
 * Bands: 2.4GHz
 * Wireless Speed: 300Mbps (Rx) + 300Mbps (Tx)
 * Antennas: Dual High Gain 5dBi Detachable Antennas
 * Ethernet Ports x Speed: 4 x Gigabit
 * Amplifiers: Dual 600mW Power Amplifiers, Dual Low Noise Amplifiers
 * Setup Requirements: Broadband Internet (i.e. Cable/DSL) connection. Computer with wired or wireless network adapter
 * OS Compatibility: Works with all OS, including Windows and Mac

feature_bullets: Dual high power 600mW amplifiers and dual high gain 5dBi antennas provide superior Wi-Fi coverage
Ultra-fast MIMO technology delivers Wireless-N speeds for HD streaming, transferring large data files and multiplayer gaming
Gigabit wired ports and a powerful internal processor deliver ultra-fast wired connections
Great for providing Wi-Fi coverage in large homes, open spaces, backyards, warehouses and offices
